org.apache.streams.twitter.api

Interface Statuses

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Twitter

    @Remoteable(path="https://api.twitter.com/1.1/statuses")
public interface Statuses
    Interface for /statuses methods.
    See Also:
    https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/tweets/post-and-engage/overview, https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/tweets/timelines/overview

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Statuses.RetweetsRequestAnnotations 
      static interface  Statuses.StatusesShowRequestAnnotations 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Tweet> homeTimeline(StatusesHomeTimelineRequest parameters)
      Returns a collection of the most recent Tweets posted by the user indicated by the screen_name or user_id parameters.
      List<Tweet> lookup(StatusesLookupRequest parameters)
      Returns fully-hydrated Tweet objects for up to 100 Tweets per request, as specified by comma-separated values passed to the id parameter.
      List<Tweet> mentionsTimeline(StatusesMentionsTimelineRequest parameters)
      Returns the 20 most recent mentions (Tweets containing a users’s @screen_name) for the authenticating user.
      RetweeterIdsResponse retweeterIds(RetweeterIdsRequest parameters)
      Returns a collection of up to 100 user IDs belonging to users who have retweeted the Tweet specified by the id parameter.
      List<Tweet> retweets(RetweetsRequest parameters)
      Returns a collection of the 100 most recent retweets of the Tweet specified by the id parameter.
      Tweet show(StatusesShowRequest parameters)
      Returns a single Tweet, specified by the id parameter.
      List<Tweet> userTimeline(StatusesUserTimelineRequest parameters)
      Returns a collection of the most recent Tweets posted by the user indicated by the screen_name or user_id parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • homeTimeline

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="GET",
              path="/home_timeline.json")
List<Tweet> homeTimeline(@QueryIfNE(value="*")
                                                                                                   StatusesHomeTimelineRequest parameters)
        Returns a collection of the most recent Tweets posted by the user indicated by the screen_name or user_id parameters.
        Parameters:
        parameters - StatusesHomeTimelineRequest
        Returns:
        List[Tweet]
        See Also:
        https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/tweets/timelines/api-reference/get-statuses-home_timeline

      • lookup

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="GET",
              path="/lookup.json")
List<Tweet> lookup(@QueryIfNE(value="*")
                                                                                      StatusesLookupRequest parameters)
        Returns fully-hydrated Tweet objects for up to 100 Tweets per request, as specified by comma-separated values passed to the id parameter.
        Parameters:
        parameters - StatusesLookupRequest
        Returns:
        List[Tweet]
        See Also:
        https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/tweets/post-and-engage/api-reference/get-statuses-lookup

      • mentionsTimeline

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="GET",
              path="/mentions_timeline.json")
List<Tweet> mentionsTimeline(@QueryIfNE(value="*")
                                                                                                           StatusesMentionsTimelineRequest parameters)
        Returns the 20 most recent mentions (Tweets containing a users’s @screen_name) for the authenticating user. The timeline returned is the equivalent of the one seen when you view your mentions on twitter.com. This method can only return up to 800 tweets.
        Parameters:
        parameters - StatusesMentionsTimelineRequest
        Returns:
        List[Tweet]
        See Also:
        https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/tweets/timelines/api-reference/get-statuses-mentions_timeline

      • show

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="GET",
              path="/show/{id}")
Tweet show(@RequestBean
                                                                            StatusesShowRequest parameters)
        Returns a single Tweet, specified by the id parameter. The Tweet’s author will also be embedded within the Tweet.
        Parameters:
        parameters - StatusesShowRequest
        Returns:
        Tweet
        See Also:
        https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/tweets/post-and-engage/api-reference/get-statuses-show-id

      • userTimeline

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="GET",
              path="/user_timeline.json")
List<Tweet> userTimeline(@QueryIfNE(value="*")
                                                                                                   StatusesUserTimelineRequest parameters)
        Returns a collection of the most recent Tweets posted by the user indicated by the screen_name or user_id parameters.
        Parameters:
        parameters - StatusesUserTimelineRequest
        Returns:
        List[Tweet]
        See Also:
        https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/tweets/timelines/api-reference/get-statuses-user_timeline

      • retweets

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="GET",
              path="/retweets/{id}")
List<Tweet> retweets(@RequestBean
                                                                                          RetweetsRequest parameters)
        Returns a collection of the 100 most recent retweets of the Tweet specified by the id parameter.
        Parameters:
        parameters - RetweetsRequest
        Returns:
        List[Tweet]
        See Also:
        https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/tweets/post-and-engage/api-reference/get-statuses-retweets-id

      • retweeterIds

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="GET",
              path="/retweeters/ids.json")
RetweeterIdsResponse retweeterIds(@QueryIfNE(value="*")
                                                                                                             RetweeterIdsRequest parameters)
        Returns a collection of up to 100 user IDs belonging to users who have retweeted the Tweet specified by the id parameter.
        Parameters:
        parameters - RetweeterIdsRequest
        Returns:
        RetweeterIdsResponse
        See Also:
        https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/tweets/post-and-engage/api-reference/get-statuses-retweeters-ids
